author: nc1234
content: To Typescript/Javascript lovers, Lodestar is a typescript implementation of consensus layer client. We have 3 projects available [here](https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-five/blob/main/projects/project-ideas.md#lodestar-deposit-contract-snapshot-interface-eip-4881) . If any of you is interested (or if you have some cool idea wanting to experiment/implement in Lodestar) feel free to reach outðŸ™‚  sorry for the shameless shill
